pacman

Class Monster

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.GameCharacter
      • pacman.Monster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Visitor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    StrongMonster, WeakMonster

    public abstract class Monster
extends GameCharacter
implements Visitor
    Author:
    Tom Leibovich and Roee Shachar 'Monster' class represents a monster in the game. It contains each monsters start positions, and their speed.

    • Method Detail

      • beats

        public boolean beats(PacMan pacman)
        'beats' checks if the monster can defeat the pacman in his current state (regular, mighty or super) using the polymorphism
        Parameters:
        pacman - - The pacman the monster has encountered
        Returns:
        - True - if the monster can beat the pacman, False - otherwise
